adrFormatAddress: 15 Warren St, New York, NY 10007, USA

originalText.text: We absolutely love the team at Tribeca Pediatrics on Warren Street. Always so welcoming. Dr Lyons has been the pediatrician for both our daughters since birth and we couldn’t have asked for a better human being to care for our children. She is wise, patient, present and truly cares about the full spectrum experience for our children. Would highly recommend.

text.text: We absolutely love the team at Tribeca Pediatrics on Warren Street. Always so welcoming. Dr Lyons has been the pediatrician for both our daughters since birth and we couldn’t have asked for a better human being to care for our children. She is wise, patient, present and truly cares about the full spectrum experience for our children. Would highly recommend.

originalText.text: My husband and I were suppose to go to another pediatrician in Queens that our hospital recommended. For whatever reason, when we went for our appointment, the office was closed. We took that as a sign that it wasn’t for us. A fellow new mom recommended Tribeca Pediatrics so we booked our newborn his first appointment at the Warren St. Location. Our medical assistant Krystal was so kind and fun! She had such a beautiful personality. She definitely set the tone for our appointment. We then saw Dr. Stephanie Blanco. She was so kind, thoughtful and knowledgeable. She left us with no questions because she answered all of them without us having to ask. We felt so confident and assured that we were doing well as first time parents. Thank you Tribeca Pediatrics for such a wonderful first time experience! Side note: The location was beautiful. The interior design was done well. Very colorful and welcoming to both the parents and babies/kids.

originalText.text: Dr. Kavisya Cherukuri misdiagnosed my son. Told me he had pneumonia and an ear infection. Went to er for a chest x-ray. Waited 6 hrs total for Two doctors to say lungs are clear and ear had a little fluid but not an infection. Complete waste of my time. I will not go back to this office.

text.text: Dr. Kavisya Cherukuri misdiagnosed my son. Told me he had pneumonia and an ear infection. Went to er for a chest x-ray. Waited 6 hrs total for Two doctors to say lungs are clear and ear had a little fluid but not an infection. Complete waste of my time. I will not go back to this office.

originalText.text:
I used to go to Montefiore with my daughter. They treated me horribly when I was freshly postpartum.
Tribeca Pediatrics is the total opposite. They play music which I've never heard at a doctors office. They also have a play area for the children which my baby loved.
Our medical assistant Eric,  allowed me to feel very comfortable with how he spoke to me. Dr. Amy Du let my baby feel comfortable by letting her walk around during the entire exam. They were very laid back, unlike many doctors offices who's staff come off robotic and judgmental. I will definitely return. Thank you for making us feel welcome.

originalText.text: The staff is always welcoming and full of smiles. Dr Yasmin is amazing! My kids aren’t afraid to see their doctor whether sick or for the annual well visit. Dr Yasmin really listens to both the parent and the kid; she is so supportive & has been such a valuable resource for me as I raise my kids.
